version_description:
A NEW HERO! The brand new sequel to the award winning, chart topping, mobile smash hit is here! Now with officially licensed, REAL clubs and leagues! Score! Hero has never looked or played so good!

Thanks everyone for your support, please keep the reviews coming!

• New stages - Season 14 is here with even greater challenges!
• New teams and kits - Authentic club data updated for the 2021/22 season!
• Daily MATCH - Score unique goals and build up your reward streak!
• More HERO customisation - To reflect your personality on the pitch.
• Improved stadium atmosphere - New banners, crowd, and more.
• NEW GAME + option
